result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Antoine D Morton

records.addlTxt: Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant. ($1,000.00 signature bond) LW

Defendant Antoine D Morton appeared by video.  Prosecuting attorney Jacob A. Maule in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant has a new case pending.  Parties are requesting a status conference. Case is adjourned to 11-7-22 at 1:30 pm for status conference by zoom.
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Status conference scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.  Defendant to have no contact with LVE.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Antoine D Morton appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Michael J Cerniglia appeared by video for Antoine D Morton.  Attorney Karine O'Byrne appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10. This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Antoine D Morton not in court.  Attorney John j Forrestal appeared by video for Antoine D Morton.  Prosecuting attorney Jacob A. Maule in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a final pretrial.  Defendant does not appear.  Court issued a bench warrant.  Court forfeifted $1,000.00 PR bond.  Jury trial date of 10-5-22 is vacated.

Defendant Antoine D Morton in court with Attorney John j Forrestal.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/LIVE ON DACAST.  Case in court for status conference.  Defense requests final pretrial and jury trial dates.  Court set dates as requested.  Case adjourned to Branch 10.  The final pretrial will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.  This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for October 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court will appoint Attorney John Forrestal to represent the defendant at count expense.

Defendant Antoine D Morton in court.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant does not qualify for public defendant representation. Defendant has Attorne John Forrestal on his other case. Court will appoint Attorney Forrestal on this case.  Case is adjourned to 7-19-22 at 1:30 pm for status of counsel.
  This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Status conference scheduled for July 19, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court is unable to hear case at at this time.  Defendant advised on zoom of next Court date and was given phone number to public defenders office.  Case scheduled for 6/22/2022 at 1:30 pm for Status Conference by zoom.

DEFENDANT WAS ORDERED BY THE COURT TO REPORT TO THE MILWAUKEE COUNTY JAIL (CJF) TO BE BOOKED AND RELEASED BY 5:00 P.M. ON 04/28/2022. IF THEY FAIL TO APPEAR A BENCH WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED FOR THEIR ARREST.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with LVE.

Defendant Antoine D Morton in court.  Alexander James Geocaris appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties. Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant.  Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant was given a referral to the Public Defender's Office. Defendant MAY be Public Defender eligible.  
The case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Br. 10.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 04/26/2022 @01:00pm
